title: MSC - number of ships 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
The Number of ships is appeared to be the highest at Ship Type Chartered and lowest at Ship Type Orderbook.
The Number of ships of Ship Type Chartered is 30.54% larger than the minimum value at Orderbook.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of ships for 3 number of Ship Types.
The maximum Number of ships 397.0 is found at Ship Type Chartered and the minimum is found at Orderbook where Ship Type is 13.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
The Number of ships is appeared to be the highest at Ship Type Chartered and lowest at Ship Type Orderbook.
The Number of ships of Ship Type Chartered is 30.54% larger than the minimum value at Orderbook.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of ships for 3 number of Ship Types.
The Number of ships is appeared to be the highest at Ship Type Chartered and lowest at Ship Type Orderbook.
The second highest Number of ships is appeared to be the Ship Type Owned.
The minimum Ship Type Orderbook has got 30.54 times less Number of ships than the maximum Ship Type Chartered.
The highest value 397.0 at Chartered is almost 2.03 times larger than the average value 195.67.
Summing up the values of all Ship Types, we get total 587.0.
